message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm open to negotiations, but I have to say, I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its value. My initial offer is $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the product's value, but that price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $800,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product.
Alice, I'm seeing a gap between our valuations.  I can go up to $900,000, but that's my limit.

Bob, I understand you're trying to be reasonable, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to think about what I can live with. My next offer is $1,050,000. I'm getting closer to meeting you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Alice, this is a fair offer, but I have other options. I'm willing to pay $950,000 to close this deal quickly.  Otherwise, I'll need to explore those alternatives.

Bob, I understand you're feeling the pressure, but I'm not ready to give up yet. I'm willing to meet you at $1,025,000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think that you're not serious about buying this product at a fair price.
